name: set-automation-status
friendlyName: Set Automation Status For Test Cases
description: Set Automation Status For Test Cases
author: Hieu Dang
instanceNameFormat: Set Automation Status For Test Cases $(testcaseid)

inputs.name: setSelector
inputs.label: Select test cases that will set

inputs.name: testPlan
inputs.label: Test plan
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a test plan containing test suites with automated test cases.

inputs.name: testSuite
inputs.label: Test suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select one or more test suites containing automated test cases. Test case work items must be associated with an automated test method.
